Job Title: Land Acquisition Specialist

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Are you a dynamic negotiator with a passion for land acquisition? Join us as a Senior Right-of-Way/Acquisition Agent in the Midwest Region. 
Our team is seeking a skilled professional to spearhead Solar Farm Lease acquisitions with finesse and expertise. As the go-to person for negotiations and relationship management with landowners, you'll play a vital role in our projects. This role demands a local presence in the Midwest Region. 
While you'll enjoy the flexibility of part-time remote work, regular travel to meet landowners is a must. 
Fear notâ€”hotel expenses and mileage are on us! 
If you're ready to make a significant impact and thrive in a fast-paced environment, apply now and be part of our exciting journey!
Job Title: Solar Land Acquisition Specialist
Location: Midwest Region 
Job Type: Contract 
Tasks and Responsibilities:
- Negotiate the acquisition of solar leases, option agreements, and letters of intent with landowners.- Update landowner contact/line list daily.- Utilize our GIS or the Clients system (will train for either)- Communicate summaries weekly showing progress for both the PM/Supervisor to covey to the Client.- Research landowner contact information, make phone calls, visit landowner addresses, and prepare mailouts to locate landowners.- Meet with the Client and Supervisor via weekly video conferences to report progress.- Research tax cards and support with proper vesting deeds to confirm ownership when needed/perform subsurface title as requested by the client.- Perform administrative tasks, including creating and approving associated forms and documents.
Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities:- Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite.- Proficiency in Google Earth/GIS systems - Effective oral and written communication skills.-Experience with curative a bonus!- Strong public relations skills for negotiating leases and settlements.- Experience with negotiating practices.- Ability to interpret legal documents comprehensively.- Willingness to travel as needed.
How to Apply:
Interested candidates should send their resume and please include; "Land Acquisition Specialist Application" in the subject line and in the body of email, include a preferred day rate.
Send to: 
Recruiting@twistedlandcompany.com by May 15th.

Experience Level (if available): None
